title: FT:  E95 Cobb PSA 1 for T206 HoF’s *TRADED*

posts.post_title: FT:  E95 Cobb PSA 1 for T206 HoF’s *TRADED*
posts.post_content: For trade is a decent lower grade E95 Cobb.  Looking to trade for T206 HOF’s with mid-tier backs.  If interested please send a PM or email to [url]tbotticell@gmail.com[/url].
